main event: A white ball of light was observed in Orleans, France on 22 April 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a thumbtack head., The object moved at a fast speed with a flame trailing behind it., It was witnessed by a US Air Force weather detachment., The sighting lasted approximately two seconds., The object did not appear to be an aircraft.
witness description: members of a US Air Force weather detachment
